TALK_ABOUT_DREAM: For me, programming is not only my work, it is also my hobby. I spend most of my free time coding, doing research on technologies to know how to do my work faster and better. I like to study programming techniques and always want to apply what I have studied to my projects. Making a project run is not enough to me, always do I want it to be easier to be maintained and expanded.
WHAT_IM_DOING: I always question myself: Is what I'm doing the best approach in the current situation ? Are there any better solutions ? Can I make the application be better in future ? ....
PERSONAL_SOLOGAN: I'm not afraid of technical difficulties. The only thing I'm scared of is my teammates are not willing to solve troubles with me together.
PLAY_COMPUTER_GAMES_DESCRIPTION: Computer games are my favorite choices when I have nothing do do or after long hours of coding. FPS games are my choice, such as: Counter Strike, Call Of Duty, ... Because of games, I studied coding, because of coding, I give up playing computer games.
LEARN_PROGRAMMING_DESCRIPTION: At the moment, I'm focusing on C# and Javascript. I want to know them deeper and deeper, use their advantages and frameworks to make my work easier.
LISTENING_TO_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Music is my first choice when I have to work for a long time. My performance at work will be better with an instrumental music playlist.
READING_DESCRIPTION: Most of my time is for programming, but it doesn't mean I don't like reading. I love light novels and novels, such as: Harry Potter, Vietnamese short stories, ...
WATCHING_MOVIE_DESCRIPTION: As I said, I was a game developer before, just because I liked computer games and guns. Therefore, if anyone invites me to go to cinema, I would like to choose action movies or movies about modern warfare: The Pacific, Act of Valor, ...
TITLE_VINCI_DESCRIPTION: The project consists of a web application & mobile application, which allows user to manage their infrastructure. Project helps mobile devices to do synchronization with web application.
TITLE_POINT_DESCRIPTION: A web system made of AngularJS and Web API 2. It helps user to manage their staffs' tasks.
TITLE_IMMERSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Project uses ASP.NET Core as its back-end service and Angular 2 as its front-end. Back-end services collect data from databases and external services and pass data to client to display.
TITLE_KCSP_DESCRIPTION: A website helps user to manage their products in warehouse. It interacts with barcode scanner to read product data, it also send data to an external system by using TCP connection.
TITLE_QNET_DESCRIPTION: A desktop application which helps users to encrypt their data on their machine. It connects to a Windows Service to run in background mode.
TITLE_KOKUGO_DESCRIPTION: Make contents which are used by students and run on tablets, phones. Contents are run on multi browsers.
TITLE_TOUCH_INSPECTION_TOOL_DESCRIPTION: A website that allows users to import images and do inspection later. It allows bulk insert operation.
TITLE_TEAMSTORE_DESCRIPTION: A website about store management. It is developed base on INTARFRM framework.
TITLE_OLIVE_DESCRIPTION: The project is separated into 2 API layers and 2 Front-end layers. The system connects doctors and patients as a network, helps doctors to monitor their patient's measurement.
TITLE_DCPS_DESCRIPTION: Project is about insurance management system.
